verbs.description: [ARG1: pipe bomb] [V: sent] [ARG2: to cnn included] get er done isis meme at least one of the apparent pipe bombs sent to prominent political figures around the country this week contained a parody image of the isis flag with part of the terror group insignia replaced with cia isis society director nbc news larry cnn james brennan
